author: Kai
message: I want to smell your skin and stroke your hair, run my fingers through your boutique, ceramic polish of a face who knows thing or two on how to please a world obsessed with veneer up; but she will find her war paint wanting, rather thin against the thickened skin of a man not polished but roughened in his unrelenting romance with the barbell and rope

author: Kai
message: I cant imagine what its like to be touched softly by fingers only inches from muscles that could snap you in two without so much as a strain, kissed by lips that cover teeth whose bite is more than little dangerous, my darling.

author: Kai
message: And yes, yes‚Ä¶I can‚Äôt help myself but wonder if you could even become my darling. In a way, Popsicle, you already are. A fellow traveler, wayfarer, another soul from another time, just passing through. I already know enough to care about you; I can‚Äôt imagine it would be hard to love you, a girl so well intending should not find herself long wanting for the affection of a man also carved from fire

author: Kai
message: So it is more accurate for you to relax. You already made it. For whatever naive or profoundly spiritual reasons beyond our comprehension, there is a part of me that says ‚Äúyes‚Äù about you. You‚Äôre enough. As you are. You don‚Äôt need to change anything. You don‚Äôt need to win, because you already won. The rest, really, is just down to timing, and the strange play of life. Maybe it will, maybe it wont. There is no loss either way x

author: Poppy
message: If I wasn‚Äôt typing right now‚Ä¶.inwould assume I‚Äôd died from the biggest bomb of love I‚Äôve ever received. Can I emotionally recover from such honesty and rawness‚Ä¶.inwill to see what the open door awaits. My darling‚Ä¶.Thankyou. Thankyou with my little house heart that beats about a million times a minute, I‚Äôve never had a man make me feel safe before and when I truly stripped everything back of what I‚Äôve had and what I crave more than anything (besides just being loved deeply) it‚Äôs to feel safe‚Ä¶.i feel both of these in sense things from you. I‚Äôm blown away ü§Ø truly‚Ä¶..I‚Äôve got to go back to work and then have Xmas drinks after work so will speak to you later my king üëë
